ARABIC: قَالَ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتُخْرِجَنَا مِنْ أَرْضِنَا بِسِحْرِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Have you come to us to expel us from our land by means of your magic, Musa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And said: "Have you come to us, O Moses, to drive us out of our land with your witchery?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land by your sorcery?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said to Moses, "Have you come to expel us from our land through your magic?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Have you come to us in order to expel us from our land by your magic, O Moosa?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He (Fir`awn) said: "Have you come to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Musa"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Said he: Have you come to us that you should turn us out of our land by your magic, O Musa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Hast thou come, Moses,' he said, 'to expel us out of our land
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Hast come to drive us out from our land by thy magic, O Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "Have you come to us to turn us out of our land by means of your magic, Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: art thou come unto us that thou mayest drive us out of our land by thy magic, O Musa!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Moses, have you come to us to expel us from our land with your magic?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Hast thou come to drive us out of our land with thy magic, O Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He [Fir'aun (Pharaoh)] said: "Have you come to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Musa (Moses)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Moses, have you come to drive us from our land with your sorcery?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Did you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:57] He said, ‘Have you come to us so that you may expel us from our land, Egypt, and so that kingship over it may be yours, by your sorcery, O Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) to Moses: (Hast thou come to drive us out from our land) Egypt (by thy magic, O Moses?
